Blog.post: Am back in Reading... Joy of joys... Scott and Christine's wedding went well and it was fairly baking weather. I wasn't quite all there there though and spent a while on the phone to Graça. Today I've been bored stupid. Tidyed room a bit, watched athletics on TV etc. Boring, boring, boring... Tomorrow should be better have an MOT on my car and then Kathryn arrives in the afternoon, ready to come to BXL with me. Sorry not really with it tonight! More soon!
urlLink Times Online Look Richard's famous! In the print version I took the photo of him!
Last day! I'm out of here! Unemployment here I come... So, successful night with Mónica last night and tomorrow is Scott and Christine's wedding! Back to BXL with Physics Kathryn next Wednesday... A+
So Rickytó has returned to the land paved with shite. Well to be honest it's not even properly paved is it? You trip over every five metres due to missing cobbles. Frickin' Brussels...
Frickin' french, frickin' subsidies... Good old Guardian! urlLink kickAAS

People on my blacklist : Daniel "Jahman" Dadson Liam "Loves the Wimmin" Cahill Richard "Dirty Dick" Freedman - Get's double points for dodgy Double Dating shenanigans Ricardo "Randy Rick" Ribeiro Paul "El Konko del Amor" Anthony Removed from Blacklist : Graça Sousa - She phoned me and moaned, so I have to or I'm "in big trouble"... Oonagh Sands - She been ill and is too nice to be on a blacklist to begin with...
urlLink BBC NEWS | UK | England | Hampshire/Dorset | Inquiry into sunbather's death Poor bloke! You couldn't make it up... I pay tribute to him.
COOL! Our office has water pouring from the roof - it's drenched our office and is starting a torrent down the road. Qualité! Ag, ag, ag!

People on my blacklist : Daniel "Jahman" Dadson Liam "Loves the Wimmin" Cahill Richard "Dirty Dick" Freedman Ricardo "Randy Rick" Ribeiro Paul "El Konko del Amor" Anthony Graça "Can you do all my work for me?" Sousa Oonagh "Is she dead?" Sands
urlLink West Midlands in Europe This is where I work, this is where I live. I no work here in one week time, I join unemployment scrapheap...

Hola! Welcome to Mikey Bee's/Miguelito Abeja's/Chantry Bee's first attempt at a blog. As you can see it's dull as. Nevermind. It's a bank holiday here in the Land-of-Belges so I'm wasting some time doing this... Contact me at mailto:chantrybee@netscape.net A+ M.Bee

Hello, hello. Am pissed off with being unemployed... Really starting to chaff my winkle. There's just nowt interesting around, I have big debts and no way to pay rent etc. All in all, it's a right pile of arse. Cooked for WMiE people last night. Had a great weekend in London with the newly casados last week. No romance in my life... Going to become a hermit. I'm cheerful aren't I? Well the weather's nice at least - 27° in September, can't complain. GET ME A JOB
urlLink ATVEA Home Page
Have been in Portugal for Euro 2004 - it was amazing... Week in Porto, week in Lisbon. saw some of the most amazing places... Will wrtite more later...

urlLink Guardian Unlimited Guardian daily comment A Harry Potter politics Sorry, is it me or does Denis MacShane come out with some slanted codswallop? I'm glad he's pro-European and all but Jesus he talks some nonsense. People in Europe look at the UK and say 'I wish our country had the low unemployment of the UK' of course, but equally they see a place of little culture, failing infrastructure (the only reason our investment's rising is because of 50 years of underinvestment...), and xenophobia. The UK is becoming more and more intolerent and this is a reason I'm abroad - I cannot stand the Little Englander mentality...
The greatest road sign in France, other than Condom of course!!! urlLink urlLink

Let's blog a bit... So, I'll write a bit on my blog for once... Last night I met my Portuguese mate Ricardo and some other Iberians for a pitta and beer. Randy Ricky's been in Porto for 2 weeks so was good to catch-up - turns out his Grandpa died the day he got home while he was on a bus... Not nice. But he seemed in fine fettle, randy as ever - prattling on about this Spanish bird's eyes! Anywhos, today the rain's returned to Brussels - I shouldn't be surprised but arg! Time to get on with some work! A+

Bored in Brussels So, it's that time of the year where continental Europe shuts down... BXL is a ghost-town I tell you... 2 people in my office... I'm struggling to achieve anything so I'm playing around on this instead... It's one of the few times I think the British consumer-driven, capitalism is all attitude has its value... Jesus, how can these European states not go bankrupt when everyone on hols??? Imagine if peeps worked in August - Europe might catch the UK up and stop being so economically sluggish... Gah! Leeds lost last night - arg! Hope we get to the ruddy play-offs...
